name: Worst TD
description:
# How to play

There are 2 buttons - Increase Shooting Range and Increase Visible Are.

Visible area is a light area. To increase it you need to spend 10 coins.

Shooting range is where your walls at + some additional space - this is where enemies are detected. This range can't be greater than Visible area, so you need to upgrade them together.

Tower shoots automatically and not upgradable (yet).

To get coins, you need to kill enemies - each kill will reward you with 10 coins!

Game is in development, so there is not a lot to do (for now), but still - HAVE FUN! And leave a comment if you liked/disliked it or want to suggest some idea.
